name: Embers of Fate
description:
Civilization is on the brink of collapse. 

People are desperate and afraid, tent cities are normative, underground economies thrive, all while the familiar infrastructure crumbles. You are plagued by a prophetic dream that sparks an ember burning deep inside your lonely existence. Take on the role of one of three interconnected heroes to overcome threats, collect Energy Cell Units (ECUs), seek allies, complete quests, and increase your power to secure the future. 

Who will you become? Who will you trust?

"Embers of Fate" was created as a project for ETEC 544: Digital Games and Learning  in UBC's Master of Educational Technology Program. 

Co-Authors:

Graeme Baerg, Anneke Nussbaum, & Angela Reynolds
